languages.text: {n}Ни звука в ответ. Но стоит вам моргнуть, и уголок рта трупа будто бы сдвигается на волосок выше. Или это игра воображения?{/n}
{n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's breadth. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ни звука в ответ. Но стоит вам моргнуть, и уголок рта трупа будто бы сдвигается на волосок выше. Или это игра воображения?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's width. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}
{n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's width. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}
{n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's breadth. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}

{n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's breadth. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}
{n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's breadth. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es kommt keine hörbare Reaktion. Doch sobald du blinzelst, scheinen sich die Mundwinkel der Leiche ein klein wenig zu heben. Oder ist das nur deine Einbildung?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's breadth. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es kommt keine hörbare Reaktion. Doch sobald du blinzelst, scheinen sich die Mundwinkel der Leiche ein klein wenig zu heben. Oder ist das nur deine Einbildung?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aucun son ne vous répond, mais dès que vous clignez des yeux, le coin de la bouche du cadavre semble remonter d'un cheveu. Ou bien est-ce seulement votre imagination ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's breadth. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aucun son ne vous répond, mais dès que vous clignez des yeux, le coin de la bouche du cadavre semble remonter d'un cheveu. Ou bien est-ce seulement votre imagination ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}尸体没有任何回应。但你眨眼的时候，你注意到，尸体的嘴角似乎向上移动了一根头发的宽度。或者说，这只是你的幻觉而已？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's breadth. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尸体没有任何回应。但你眨眼的时候，你注意到，尸体的嘴角似乎向上移动了一根头发的宽度。或者说，这只是你的幻觉而已？{/n}

languages.text: {n}返事は聞こえてこない。しかし、まばたきをすると、死体の口角が、くいっとほんの少し上に動いたように見えた。いや、ただの妄想か？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's breadth. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}返事は聞こえてこない。しかし、まばたきをすると、死体の口角が、くいっとほんの少し上に動いたように見えた。いや、ただの妄想か？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ni un sonido como respuesta. Pero en cuanto parpadeas, la comisura de la boca del cadáver parece moverse un poco hacia arriba. ¿O es solo tu imaginación?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's breadth. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ni un sonido como respuesta. Pero en cuanto parpadeas, la comisura de la boca del cadáver parece moverse un poco hacia arriba. ¿O es solo tu imaginación?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cevap olarak tek bir çıt bile duymuyorsun. Ancak gözlerini kırptığın anda cesedin dudağının kenarı sanki bir milim yukarı doğru kıvrılıyor. Yoksa hayal gücün seni mi yanıltıyor?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Not a sound comes in response. But as soon as you blink, the corner of the corpse's mouth seems to move upward by a hair's breadth. Or is it just your imagination?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cevap olarak tek bir çıt bile duymuyorsun. Ancak gözlerini kırptığın anda cesedin dudağının kenarının bir milimetre yukarı kıvrıldığını görüyorsun. Yoksa hayal gücün seni mi yanıltıyor?{/n}
